message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $80. I would like to extend this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $75. This is an exclusive offer tailored for potential buyers like yourself who appreciate the value of our product.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to pay closer to $70.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To meet in the middle, I propose we set the price at $72 for the product. This is slightly above your offer but still offers a good saving compared to the original price. I hope this proposal works for you.
